item.title: The REST API
item.description: Use the operator’s REST services The operator provides a REST server which you can use to get a list of WebLogic domains and clusters and to initiate scaling operations. Swagger documentation for the REST API is available here. You can access most of the REST services using GET, for example: To obtain a list of domains, send a GET request to the URL /operator/latest/domains To obtain a list of clusters in a domain, send a GET request to the URL /operator/latest/domains/<domainUID>/clusters All of the REST services require authentication.
